# TregaTa

## Overview
tregata will be a (meta-)package for waterchemistry and gasflux calculations.
It is initially designed for the TregaTa Project and may include some project related functions at early stages.

## Installation

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# The package is not yet released on CRAN.
# Development version from GitHub:
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("tekknosol/tregata")
```

## Usage

```{r, eval = TRUE}
data("gasmet", "meta")
flux_raw <- preprocess_gasmet(gasmet, meta)
glimpse(flux_raw)
```
